Summary Note:
Simons  Jacobs and the RM met at a financial seminar in Brussels. They attended several workshops together and exchanged ideas on market trends, which sparked a long-term professional relationship.
Simons  Jacobs is a seasoned professional with over 44 years of experience.
Julius Baer's commitment to client satisfaction and innovative financial strategies convinced he to join.
Family Background: Simons  Jacobs has been happily married to Daphné since 1988. Their children are named Fatima and Charlotte.
Education Background:
In 1965, Simons graduated from Koninklijk Atheneum Gent with a secondary school diploma.
In 1982, Simons graduated from University of Liège with a degree.
Occupation History:
Simons  Jacobs is a 67 year old and comes from Belgium.
Simons  Jacobs launched his career as a Software Developer at Option NV, where he gained valuable experience from 1981 to 1982.
After gaining experience, he took on the role of Startup Founder at Option NV in 1982, further expanding his skill set.
He spent 2 years working as a CEO at Option NV, refining his expertise and building a strong network.
He worked as a Venture Capitalist at Barco NV from 1990 to 1993, playing a pivotal role in shaping the company's vision and strategy.
Simons  Jacobs retired after holding the position of Tech Industry Leader at EVS Broadcast Equipment SA from 1993 to 2018.
Wealth Summary:
During his work, he focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 2100000 EUR.
His remarkable portfolio comprises 3 stunning properties. Situated in prime locations across Namur, Hasselt and Ostend, these assets demonstrate their sophisticated understanding of real estate investments and high-end lifestyle preferences.
He does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: Given the client's impressive career history and financial discipline, we are confident in his ability to achieve financial success and security.
